After complaints of all-night parties in a quiet street in Darwen, Lancashire, letting agent Paul pays the revellers a visit. The house is in terrible shape, but the young tenants promise they will clear it all up and keep the noise down. Instead, however, the partying gets worse, with some of the tenants' 'associates' making nasty threats

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Sgt Matt heads a team in pursuit of a teenage driver transporting stolen goods in a 7.5-ton truck, with the desperate youth ramming three police cars, almost running over an officer, and driving the wrong way up a dual carriageway before abandoning the vehicle and running off

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: On the M1, Karl responds to a police camera alert on a stolen car that has been linked to a spate of burglaries, while controllers receive a 999 call from a man reporting that his car has just been stolen from his driveway. A report of a suspected stolen Range Rover takes a dramatic twist when the police arrest the suspect, who claims he had been kidnapped by the owner of the car

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jon puts his body on the line as he tackles a drunken youth in a domestic dispute and Martin turns detective to catch a drink-driver who thinks she can get one over on the interceptors. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Sgt Carlin arrests a gang of van thieves and uncovers a major criminal operation in the process, while a late-night compost thief is caught on his way out of the shower. Officers hunt for a trucker wielding a baseball bat who has apparently succumbed to road rage and vegetarian Craggy rides to the rescue of a lorry load of calves on the A46. Elsewhere, Brian cracks down on a barbaric blood sport, Jon faces an unexploded bomb, and two fuel thieves plough straight into the interceptors' precious BMW

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers from Lincolnshire's Roads Policing Unit are at the forefront of a raid against suspected drug traffickers, the hunt is on for a driver who has fled the scene of a horrific crash, and Rich Precious and Sean Baxter are left lagging far behind as they chase a speeding biker. Dan Brigginshaw is on duty at Spalding's annual flower show, and Sean Brennan deals with a young man who thinks he can throw his weight around after a boozy night out

programme.title: Dogs Behaving (Very) Badly
programme.desc: Dog trainer Graeme Hall meets Australian labradoodle Doddle, who was intended as a companion for owner Sarah's nine-year-old son. But he is being overbearing with his love, licking the boy's face at every opportunity. On the flipside, he also deals with cockapoo Leia, who loves mum and the kids but hates dad. Can Graeme get these pooches to alter their ways?

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Summer Bay is rocked by disaster. Bree springs into action to save a life, and Kate continues to lean on Xander

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Ameet Tailor lends his expertise to Daniel, a 20-something self-confessed cannabis addict who has become frustrated by his inability to kick the habit. It is up to Dr Ameet to calm his patient and get him into rehab. Dr David Ward deals with angry Irishman David, who arrives on crutches and with an injured hand following a fight. David is furious with the council, and is taking a distinctly negative approach to life, so the doctor suggests he tackle his problems one at a time. Finally, nurse Sheila Wellavise helps cheerful patient Mario, who almost cut off the end of his finger while using a circular saw while doing a spot of DIY

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: It's another busy day for the casualty team with patient numbers unusually high. American naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Sasha Alexander

programme.desc: The team races to find a sniper who is targeting marine recruitment officers and picking them off one by one. American drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sasha Alexander and Michael Weatherly

programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate when a priest is found murdered in the confessional booth. The arrest of a teenager with a grudge seems to have them on the right track, but after discovering that the clergyman wasn't the killer's intended target they begin to focus their search on a petrol station cashier. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A high-level insurance executive is murdered, and suspicion soon falls on the father of a dying nine-year-old whose claim for a life-saving leukaemia treatment was turned down. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Two room-mates are found bludgeoned to death in their flat, and the handyman is the prime suspect. As his options run out, he takes a hostage, forcing Southerlyn into a course of action that could jeopardise her career. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Gene Silvers, and Elisabeth Rohm

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates the stabbing of a teacher whose body has been found in a caretaker's cupboard. The hunt for her killer leads to the discovery that she was caught up in a love triangle at school involving a student with multiple identities. Legal drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A witness to a jewellery store robbery that went tragically wrong fails to appear in court. McCoy suspects foul play - until it transpires the man has been on the run for the past 20 years. Police drama, guest starring Mandy Patinkin of Criminal Minds fame, with Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a struggling actress in what appears to have been a bungled robbery. When a couple produce a video tape showing the thieves at work, the detectives waste little time in tracking down their suspects. Legal drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine helicopter is discovered abandoned in a crop circle with its pilots missing, and witnesses report seeing strange lights in the night sky, adding to the intrigue surrounding the case. Gibbs orders the sightings to be kept under wraps for fear of attracting the attention of UFO enthusiasts, before uncovering a dark secret involving local residents. Guest starring Timothy Bottoms (The Last Picture Show)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An investigation into the rape and murder of a woman revives harrowing memories for Ducky, who once worked on a similar case in which the killer was never captured and vowed to return. Bafflingly, both victims were civilians dressed in the uniform of a lieutenant, and each had a trident symbol carved into their neck. Starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An accident at a Navy bombing range brings to light an area used by the Mafia to dump bodies. One of the corpses is identified as a missing FBI agent, so the team investigates the events leading up to his death. Crime drama, guest starring Joe Spano, with Mark Harmon

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Fugitives Liz and Red take a detour towards the Midwest, and although the FBI are still hot on their heels, Ressler, Samar and Aram's progress is slowed when they uncover a global crisis. Meanwhile, having recently been removed from his position, Cooper reaches out to a surprising ally

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman is found wandering alone in Central Park resulting in the reopening of a 10-year-old case, while Benson and Porter go to family court regarding Noah. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found dead, Rollins goes undercover at a high-end rehab centre where she was last seen alive. Meanwhile, Benson tries to overcome her doubts about Sheila

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a petty officer in a small town outside Washington, D.C, prompts the team to once again partner with The Sherlocks, a privately funded investigative team that includes their newest member, Anthony DiNozzo Sr. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Abby's homeland security think-tank is compromised when its leader is found to have been murdered, and a theoretical guide to how to pull off a terror attack is stolen

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A carjacking turns nasty when an off-duty police officer is killed and the driver is kidnapped. Luckily, Briscoe and Curtis capture one of the perpetrators, who offers to reveal the whereabouts of the missing driver to DA Ross - in exchange for immunity on the cop-killing charge. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV is helping to bring criminals using weapons to justice. A CCTV operator's instincts lead him to keep an eye on a man acting suspiciously on a train station platform and who then takes a knife out of his pocket and threatens a woman coming towards him. There is also footage of a raid on a west London jewellery shop, with the gang spraying bleach in the eyes of security guards and smashing down the doors with pickaxes while the terrified staff cower inside

Starring Michael Weatherly and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs entrusts the team with the task of finding his former commanding officer, who has gone on the run rather than staying behind to face charges of killing a marine and stealing funds. Kate and Tony's investigation leads them to the missing man's cabin - which has been sprayed with bullets and contains an unidentified corpse. Mark Harmon stars

As Gibbs and the team struggle to resolve the crisis, they are alarmed to discover there is a Hamas operative in their midst. Crime drama, guest starring Alan Dale (Ugly Betty)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate a state senator suspected of involvement in the disappearance of one of his aides. Their progress is hindered by a lack of evidence, but when her body is found in a marsh, the case turns into a murder inquiry. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green believe the fatal stabbing of psychologist Tracy Conley may be linked to confidential client information on her computer. They learn one of the files on her hard drive has been tampered with since her death - information that would have ensured a known rapist spends another five years behind bars. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old girl is found suffocated to death in Central Park, Briscoe and Green discover her adoptive mother's attempts to discipline the child may have inadvertently caused the tragedy. However, the case is thrown into confusion when a post-mortem reveals she may actually have died of an allergic reaction. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Two thieves discover the skeletal remains of a woman who was believed to have died in the September 11 attacks on the World Trade Centre. It transpires that a valuable and unusual ring has been stolen from the body, and the team suspects foul play.

programme.title: Law & Order

Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: NCIS

A breakthrough convinces them they have discovered the bomber targeting her, but things are not quite as they seem. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: NCIS

Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a model and discover splashes of blood that obviously did not come from the victim, but suggest the culprit is a relative. With Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.desc: Cassy, Vern and Gus are gifted students who go to an enchanted school to learn about magic. After receiving a book named UBOS (Ultimate Book of Spells) they soon begin their journey of a lifetime.

programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Skysurfer Strike Force
programme.desc: Jack Holister is an extraordinary skydiver who leads a group of vigilante crime fighters known as the Skysurfer Strike Force. who must try to seek out and defeat the robotic Cybron

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance.

programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: Shine On Harvey Moon
programme.desc: Rita is grumpy because her GI companions have returned home, and Harvey cannot hold down a job

programme.title: Italy Made With Love
programme.desc: Umbria, the green heart of Italy, is the land that time and tourism forgot. Shaped by geography and politics, the region became a thriving model of creative self-sufficiency

programme.title: Goodnight Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoebe loses patience with Gary's apparent lack of interest in her new film role, and contemplates having a fling to teach him a lesson. Comedy, starring Nicholas Lyndhurst and Elizabeth Carling

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: Documentary following a group of West Ham FC fans who have formed friendships by wearing colourful shirts when they support their team in the stands

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Pigsy is hailed as the new King and God of the Kingdom of the Red Hog, but Tripitaka discovers the current ruler is a demon and Monkey sets out with Sandy to stop him and save Princess Green Lotus

programme.title: Lost in the Stars (1974)
programme.desc: A black South African minister searching the unfamiliar back alleys and shantytowns of Johannesburg for his missing son. Musical drama, starring Brock Peters and Melba Moore

programme.title: Frieda (1947)
programme.desc: An RAF officer returns home after the Second World War, having broken out of a prisoner of war camp. He brings with him his new wife - a German woman who helped him escape. However, family and friends struggle to accept the marriage - especially when her brother comes to visit. Drama based on Ronald Millar's stage play, starring Mai Zetterling and David Farrar

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans come into contact with an alien craft, and Maya persuades the crew to help release the prisoner it is carrying. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: The Bearded Vulture is one of the largest birds of prey in Europe and one of the rarest

programme.title: The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin
programme.desc: When Reggie loses his job at the pig farm, he and Elizabeth decide to find something they can work at together, so they consult with Jimmy. Classic 1970s comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter, Pauline Yates and Geoffrey Palmer

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Munroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: The Alan Clark Diaries
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, Alan tries to secure the safe seat of Kensington and Chelsea and return to political prominence. However, his ambition is cut short when he is diagnosed with cancer. In a secluded hospital, nursed by Jane, he loses his greatest battle. John Hurt and Jenny Agutter star. Part of The Thatcher Years strand

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: Documentary following a group of West Ham FC fans who have formed friendships by wearing colourful shirts when they support their team in the stands

programme.title: Triple Cross (1966)
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War spy adventure about Eddie Chapman, a bank robber who became a British double agent in exchange for money and a full pardon. Following the German invasion of Jersey, Chapman offers to provide information to the Nazis, who are unaware his loyalties really lie with the British Secret Service. With Christopher Plummer, Trevor Howard, Yul Brynner, Romy Schneider and Claudine Auger

programme.title: An Englishman in New York
programme.desc: John Hurt reprises his role as Quentin Crisp in this sequel to The Naked Civil Servant, picking up his story where the 1975 drama about the eccentric Englishman left off. Crisp sets off on the journey of a lifetime to the Big Apple, where the Americans immediately embrace the openly gay writer and his waspish ways, and before long he is being wined and dined by celebrities in every corner of Manhattan. But, as is so often the case with Quentin, he cannot resist making outrageous comments, and an ill-considered quip about the growing Aids crisis sees him suddenly dropped from high society. Sex and the City's Cynthia Nixon co-stars as performance artist Penny Arcade, with Jonathan Tucker, Denis O'Hare and Swoosie Kurtz

programme.title: Sam Kelly's Station House
programme.desc: Sam Kelly, the original drummer with 1970s funk band Cymande, brings his blues & soul band to the screen with a recorded show performing tracks from their No Barricades album

programme.desc: Short visual tours for locals and tourists, exploring Elephant & Castle and Croydon. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Last Holiday (1950)
programme.desc: A man believes he has a terminal disease, prompting him to embark on a final fling abroad. Comedy, starring Alec Guinness and Kay Walsh

programme.title: Black Jack (1979)
programme.desc: A rascally French sailor is saved from hanging in 18th-century Yorkshire and sets out on the road with an apprentice, rescuing a young girl from an asylum along the way. Ken Loach's period adventure, adapted from Leon Garfield's classic children's novel, starring Jean Franval, Stephen Hirst, Andrew Bennett and Louise Cooper

programme.title: The Lion Queen
programme.desc: Glen Garriff Lion Reserve faces disaster after disaster. A fire burns out of control on a neighbouring farm and threatens to spread to Glen Garriff, where a vital piece of firefighting equipment is out of action

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Auschwitz in 33 Objects
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind the personal items and belongings left behind in Auschwitz Birkenau, a former nazi concentration and extermination camp, the world's largest cemetery and resting place. Part one of five

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert sets out again to explore some of Britain's finest habitats and most spectacular wildlife, beginning in Scotland's Caledonian pine forests, home to rare species including the capercaillie. Ray camps out in the hope of catching the turkey-sized grouse's courtship display, and also goes in search of the red squirrel

programme.title: Top Tens of Warfare
programme.desc: Documentary in which rarely-seen archive footage and expert interviews identify and rank history's most influential military equipment. The series begins with a look at aircraft, from the P51 Mustang through to the modern Harrier jump jet

programme.title: When Missing Turns to Murder
programme.desc: The parents of Lorraine Benson revisit the moment their missing daughter's body was found. Meanwhile, Met police investigators look back at the tragic case

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Hands of a Murderer (1990)
programme.desc: The sleuth pursues his arch-enemy Moriarty, who has escaped the gallows and is plotting to steal top-secret information from British intelligence. When Holmes foils his scheme, Moriarty kidnaps the detective's spymaster brother with the intention of forcing him to reveal all his secrets. Detective drama, starring Edward Woodward, John Hillerman and Anthony Andrews

programme.title: Radio On (1979)
programme.desc: A DJ drives from London to Bristol to investigate his brother's death, encountering a succession of strange people along the way - but his interest in solving the mystery begins to wane as the journey unfolds. Road movie, starring David Beames, Lisa Kreuzer and Sting

programme.title: Car Trouble (1986)
programme.desc: A sexually unsatisfied woman realises her husband's beloved new car means more to him than her. She has a fling with a salesman that accidentally results in the destruction of the precious vehicle, and consumed by rage, the husband plans a murderous revenge. Comedy, starring Julie Walters, Ian Charleson and Stratford Johns

programme.desc: This special extended episode shows what goes into the production of London's newest electric taxi

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: For the final leg of his journey, Paul Murton heads to the northern Shetland islands of Fetlar, Unst and Yell, which were once part of Norway. Along the way, he meets the members of a male vocal group who came together to celebrate their Norse heritage, gets a close view of wild otters, and fulfils a longheld ambition to visit Out Stack, the rocky outcrop that is the northernmost point of the British Isles

Drama, with Phyllis Calvert and James Mason

programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as four contestants pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as contestants Lindsay, Win, Sonali and Paul pit their wits against ruthless quiz genius the Chaser. programme.title: Strike It Lucky
programme.desc: Michael Barrymore hosts the madcap game show, in which three teams of two prove seek to progress along a board game-style path by answering questions. Each duo are allowed to determine how many spaces they would like to move by answering the corresponding number of questions. Landing on a space reveals it's hidden contents, which could amount to a prize, or a 'hot spot', which causes contestants to forfeit their gathered winnings
